formatted_address: LG2-01, Lower Ground Floor, Puteri Cove Quayside, Persiaran Tanjung, Puteri Harbour, 79000 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: O’Coffee Club Xpress @ Puteri Cove Quayside, Johor

reviews.text: After having lunch there today - advocado bagel and a freshly squeezed juice - I have been throwing up for the last 2hrs. I am pretty sure the advocado was Ok so the juice must be bad. This is my second bad experience eating here....I will not give them another chance!. Becareful folks, you have been warned!
I think the items are free at the shop here. Self service policy without need to pay q1
Good place, good foods and good people here. Love it so much.

It's a small store inside a sports club and smaller than O'Coffee Club in Puteri. Upon entering, you will be given a disposable paper bracelet at the information counter. You can pay with your sports club membership card in the store. If you pay with cash, you can pay at the information desk when you leave. It seems like the menu is smaller than other stores, but it's good for a quick meal because there aren't many people. The overall menu is decent and delicious, and the staff is friendly.

vicinity: LG2-01, Lower Ground Floor, Puteri Cove Quayside, Persiaran Tanjung, Puteri Harbour, Iskandar Puteri
